name: TOYWARS THE LAST STAND
description:
PLAY GAME

We're going to lose this war. you're the last soldier toy who can stand up and fight, finish your mission to win this war for everyone!!! How to Play  Press the W,A,S,D key to Walk. Press the Spacebar to Jump.  Press the LShift to Run.   Press the Right Click to Aim.   Press the Left Click to Shoot. DEKANT TEAM MEMBER
